text:
Hi Team,
Is it mandatory to run wallet-web-UI?  Can we  access our wallet from cli and disable the web UI ?

elements.text:
Hi Team,
Is it mandatory to run wallet-web-UI?  Can we  access our wallet from cli and disable the web UI ?

text: web-ui app provides static content only, so not running it won't do any harm

elements.text: web-ui app provides static content only, so not running it won't do any harm

text: Ok thanks for this info, any idea if we stop the wallet web ui then how can we access our wallet and do transfers through cli, any steps ?

elements.text: Ok thanks for this info, any idea if we stop the wallet web ui then how can we access our wallet and do transfers through cli, any steps ?

text:
Hey,
Does anyone know if there is a procedure for changing a validator's IP address?
One that was earlier whitelisted to a new one?

elements.text:
Hey,
Does anyone know if there is a procedure for changing a validator's IP address?
One that was earlier whitelisted to a new one?

text: Ask new one to be whitelisted, & once done (D+7 at least), use new IP, then ask for old IP to be removed

elements.text: Ask new one to be whitelisted, & once done (D+7 at least), use new IP, then ask for old IP to be removed

text: Thanks!

elements.text: Thanks!

text: The schedule listed 0.4.4 as going to devnet on Tuesday. This morning, the Upgrade Announcement app (re?)announced it. Later this morning, <https://github.com/digital-asset/decentralized-canton-sync/releases/tag/v0.4.5> released on GitHub. I _think_ the conclusion is that devnet is currently on 0.4.4, which lines up with <https://sync.global/sv-network/>, but clarification would be appreciated?

attachments.text: Contribute to digital-asset/decentralized-canton-sync development by creating an account on GitHub.

text:
Hi, I'm trying to setup the canton utility tool but I don't have access to the DAR packages nor the `canton-network-utility-docker` image in JFrog, how can I move forward?
<https://docs.digitalasset.com/utilities/0.7/canton-utility-setup/utility-setup.html>

Also, if I configured different `audience` for the participant and validator I won't be able to use the UI?

elements.text: Hi, I'm trying to setup the canton utility tool but I don't have access to the DAR packages nor the
canton-network-utility-docker
image in JFrog, how can I move forward?
Also, if I configured different
audience
for the participant and validator I won't be able to use the UI?

text: You need an account. Send an email to <mailto:da-support@digitalasset.com|da-support@digitalasset.com> and request one, then let them know which resources you need access to.

elements.text: You need an account. Send an email to
da-support@digitalasset.com
and request one, then let them know which resources you need access to.
